__e: What sets us apart from the animals is that we can think,feel,dream and love.
It was an honor to read those letters because now I know that what separates you from the others isn't one stupid point.
The difference between us is that I knew when to hang it up.
Just give me a moment, please, Lieutenant.
It's different from any problem we have ever faced before.
Your interpretation of bringing sex out into the open and mine are two different things.
And that is different from what Billy did... how?
And how's it any different from what you do?
How is that so different from what we're doing?
What comes before now is no different than what is now, or what is to come.
Then perhaps the reason you are here is not so different than the reason I am here.
It's different from any problem we have ever faced before.
Opposable thumbs separate us from animals!
That's the difference between us and them.
What we don't have in common is that I don't care if I live and you do.
-That's the difference between you and me. I have a mind of my own.
After this is over, you'll be no different from billions of others who didn't find one.
How does that make you any different than the people who destroyed your village?
Plenty of girls like you, but what sets you apart?
Tell me about males. What is it makes you different from females?
I like to use a condom.
What do they have that is different from the ones I know?
